quote: The utilization of data science and machine learning approaches in medical fields proves to be prolific as such approaches may be considered of great assistance in the decision making process of medical practitioners.
The machine learning algorithms were trained to detect breast cancer using the Wisconsin Diagnostic Breast Cancer (WDBC) dataset.

The application of such a technique will not only provide a more accurate measure of model prediction performance, but it will also assist in determining the most optimal hyper-parameters for the ML algorithms.
